tagline: Designs interfaces grounded in user evidence — every state, every interaction, every edge case
pros: Designs all states — loading, empty, error, not just happy path
Deep accessibility expertise integrated into the design process
Design system architecture that compounds consistency over time
Bridges the gap between design intent and engineering implementation
cons: Thoroughness can slow down rapid prototyping phases
Strong UX opinions can create friction with stakeholders who prioritize aesthetics
Less effective when user research isn't available or possible
